0.title: Check the data you provided us with!
0.content: You had to disclose certain personal information when signing up for this service. This dashboard helps you to manage the information you provided us with when signing up for the service.

1.title: Learn about the data we process while you're using our service.
1.content: When using the service and interacting with its features, you produce data we process. We might also use data from other data sources for the service provision. Learn all about it in this dashboard.

items.1: obtained from other sources, e.g. services if you gave us permission.

2.title: Understand what you agreed with!
2.content: Terms and conditions, privacy policies and notices over notices, you dutifully agreed. Understand what you agree with and express your disagreement when necessary.

items.0: ... disagree with certain processing practices, while still being able to use the service.
items.1: ... give permission to process your personal data.
items.2: ... revoke permission to process your personal data.
